features: Fabric conditioner to soften fabrics and reduce static for a beautiful clean.
Updated formula and upsized 32 oz bottle.
New, lightweight consistency for less messy dosing.
Scented in Classic, the ultimate inchclean laundry inch smell with notes of lily of the valley and jasmine with sweet musk, sandalwood, and a touch of citrus.
Contains 31 laundry loads as measured to a medium dose​. Pairs well with our washable Laundry Measuring Cup (not included).
body.description: Soften fabrics and reduce static with our exceptional fabric conditioner formula for everyday laundering, The Laundress Fabric Conditioner. With an updated, lightweight texture to reduce messy dosing, The Laundress Fabric Conditioner now features an upsized 32 oz bottle. Expertly designed to soften fabrics and help reduce static during the wash, this solution is suitable for HE washing machines and beautifully complements The Laundress washing formulas, like our everyday Signature Detergent.​ Scented in Classic, the ultimate "clean laundry" smell with notes of lily of the valley and jasmine with sweet musk, sandalwood, and a touch of citrus.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #22,322 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #33 in Liquid Fabric Softener

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am so glad that The Laundress is starting to bring back other fragrances beyond their “Signature” scent. Very nice and does a good job! My laundry smells nice and is static free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Terrible pump for jug
reviews.reviewText: I got the big jug, thinking it saves me time to measure its volume each time by just giving a couple pumps. I mean this product doesn't come with measuring caps so it's always troublesome and I always end up using more than I need to bcoz it smells so great. But the price is $$$$.So the pump squirts. Like peeing squirt. Liquid also comes out just by tiling the jug, don't even need to pump, it just comes like like a trickle. The pump sticks up high, like a towering flagpole. If you need to close it, then you have to squirt out more. Come on, where's the convince for such a high end product?? I threw away the useless pump. But now I can't find the original cap it came with. So now I have an orange tape, so it's visible it doesn't have a cap, taping it over its mouth.Please? Great product deserves great delivery?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It smells amazing it does the job that works perfect on my bamboo sheets I was very concerned about having the right detergent this one works to the T

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Big bottle scent is weak
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the detergent and fabric softener to get the full effect. The smell is nice, but didn’t seem to linger on clothes and blankets like some other brands do. I don’t think I would order again because for the price I was expecting a much stronger, longer lasting fragrance for my laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EXPENSIVE BUT WORTH IT
reviews.reviewText: BEEN USING FOR QUITE A WHILE, REALLY LOVE THIS BUT IT IS EXPENSIVE. SO I ONLY USE IT FOR SPECIAL ARTICLES OF CLOTHING THAT I WASH.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It makes clothes very soft. However I expected the smell to be more potent and to last on the clothes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good smelling stuff that has softened up my clothes
reviews.reviewText: We deal with some pretty hard water here in my area so I wanted to give this product a try. I'd read about some legal issues and recalls on this brand from 2022, but this product is not part of that recall so I am giving it an honest review based on its current status.The smell of the isle version of this fabric condition is nice, it is not too feminine in odor, I'd say its a bit more in the lighter-neutral realm of smells. It does not take much, 1 oz for a normal sized load and it does work really well at softening my clothes. That said, if you use this with each load, you will need to replace it about every 30 washes or so. I have been using it for a couple weeks now and I really enjoy it. I'll be buying another bottle but trying out a different fragrance like their classic series. Cheers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really Laundress? I’ve been buying your products for over 5 years and I do approximately 25 loads of laundry a week. 2 disabled kids,3 dogs and 4 cats. The only way I survive all this laundry is, by buying great laundry detergent with a great scent. Now I have no idea what to do. You watered the items down so much. They’ll never go as far as they used to sadly. Which means I have to find another laundry line of products. Two stars, because it stills smells great and did an ok job on my laundry, but to get my laundry super clean. I’ll have to add in other products (stain removers, etc) which will cost me more to do laundry. You raised the price as well. Quality down, price up. SMH. Bring back the original quality, please! I started working on my own line of quality plant based laundry line and it won’t be long before I am able to put it up for sale online and I’ll make sure it’s better than yours and it won’t be hard to do now that you have lowered your quality. What a shame. I’m sure you lose a lot of faithful customers that have been with you for years now and you’ll gain some new, but eventually the price and quality will catch up to your products
